channel.title: How do i make barrows armer more realistic?
channel.description:
Hello, I was just playing the actual runescape and had my dharok in my inventory and though, hmm, what if i could make the same effects that this has on a moparscape server. So my question is, can you? (Like when you attack with it or get attacked by something it gets a health number of 100, then like 85 etc... And also, could you make it the same effects (like when you get like full dharok armer on and the greataxe can you make it so you hit double your hit or something dealing with 10% health? Just answer the question people that are really good with this kind of stuff.
Thank you, -Zaron

item.title: How do i make barrows armer more realistic?
item.dc:creator: @Zaron Zaron
item.description:
@Zaron wrote:

[quote=“x0 0wn, post:14, topic:157852”]What’s ’ armer’ ?[/quote] Actually, that’s how you actually spell it. If your cool and have firefox it has it’s own spell check. Armer is spelled right and armour isnt spelled right, on the other hand, armor is a word.

Thanks luke, what if i gave you my server, could you do this on there?

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make barrows armer more realistic?
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

No tut.
Heres what you do:

Make your HP ints for the armor, add the methed on how the HP is decreased,
THEN, make the methed for the transition between armors, as in, axe (100) being deleted from equipted, then the replacement with (75).
You will need to define how the HP is going to be reduced, fix bugs for logging in with degraded armor/weps, make sure bonuses and requirements are poportional, and to top it off, do that for every peice of equipment you want degrading. Have. Fun.

That’s a sugar coated topping hehe, have fun fixing the hella bugs you will encounter, and trust me, you WILL encounter them.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make barrows armer more realistic?
